The viscosity of the samples was analyzed using a rheometer (AR G2, TA Instruments Ltd., New Castle, DE, USA) with a stainless-steel cone plate geometry of 62 mm diameter and 1° cone angle. The steady-state flow procedure was performed in the range of 0.1 to 100 s −1, in triplicates at 20 °C. The TA Rheology Advantage Data Analysis V 5.4.7 software was used to record and analyze the rheological data.
